Summary: brighter than a star no blinking lights looked like a triangle and a ball of light as it got further away.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Byron
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWife was on the phone outside having a cigerette in the drive way in front of the house facing South directly at the moon. She came and got me and I ran out and watched it for a brief moment then ran in to grab cell phone to video record it. It traveled behind the moon and it appeared as a bright light but in trianglular form. It traveled faster than a plane but made no sound and had no blinking lights. It was a clear sky with just moon out. It looked like a ball of light as it got further away traveling NE and then seemed to vier east.It continued over the town untill it was out of sight. We only saw it for a few minutes. The sighting left us in awe and bewildered. I wanted to get in my truck and follow it but didn't.
